** Closed by Jothay 12/20/2010 4:08 PM

Sorry, I have been searching this site for the last two days, found something about armory import yesterday listed as "fixed" with no further info, and have downloaded the latest version of the addon, refreshed the beta, cleared the item cache, and am still not getting items marked as available when I paste into the addon.  Obviously I am missing some thread here that explains the issue, but...where?
The new version that has the fix (.13) hasn't been posted yet, but the code is fixed.
